_sText:
This is a hostage rescue map based on a hockey arena, I spent a year off and on working on this, it includes many custom textures and detailed brushwork. There is a lot of detail in this map, but it's fairly well optimized, excellent for 32 player size server. Some features of the map:

-Full HDR
-40 Players
-Custom textures
-3D skybox
-Custom sound and soundscape
-Fully tweaked nav file
-Overview and radar overview
-All content bsp zipped

Note: Check out the defuse version of this map at http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/82911

Terrorists- You have taken control of the arena and are holding the hostages, prevent the CT's from rescuing them while saving yourselves.

Counter Terrorists- The Terrorists have taken control of the arena, rescue the hostages at all costs.

Thanks to my friend Furyo for help with render problems and areaportals, visit him at www.froughol.com

Stard00d for the snack machine model visit him at www.d00ds.com

My friends at Toronto Darkly for playtesting, visit www.torontodarkly.ca
